title: Bug 121323: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
OB: The filter information entered in the XML Edit Data Set dialog is not persisted when leaving the dialog
EB: The filter information entered in the XML Edit Data Set dialog should be persisted when leaving the dialog
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog. 2. Enter an XPath expression with a selection part, such as 'section[@id='left']'. 3. Close the dialog. 4. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog again and verify that the filter information is not persisted.
